long_description: Keep cool on warm-weather rides in the women's sleeveless Zoic Muse Bike Jersey with ventilating back panels, front zipper vent and wicking, stretchy polyester/spandex fabric. Recycled polyester offers stretch and breathability; spandex adds stretch. Mesh panels across upper back enhance airflow for cool comfort. Easy-glide 7.5 in. zipper locks in position when pull is facing down. Zipper garage at collar protects against zipper pinch and abrasion. Wide bottom hem is longer in back for better coverage when riding. Double rear pockets have elastic openings; tech pocket holds a phone or music player. Zoic Muse Bike Jersey features a flattering, tapered fit, henna-style print at shoulder and tagless label for next-to-skin comfort.
short_description: Keep cool on warm-weather rides in the women's sleeveless Zoic Muse Bike Jersey with ventilating back panels, front zipper vent and wicking, stretchy polyester/spandex fabric.
